page.title: 06CLUBS IN BRORA
page.content: THERE ARE AN ASSORTMENT OF CLUBS AND ASSOCIATIONS IN BRORA.ON MONDAY THERE IS A SWIMMING CLUB WHICH GOES ALONG TO GOLSPIE WHICH HAS THE LOCAL SWIMMING POOL.A LOT OF BRORA CHILDREN ATTEND THIS SWIMMING CLUB,AS WELL AS A LOT OF OTHER CHILDREN FROM VARIOUS POINTS DOTTED AROUND OUR DISTRICT,SUTHERLAND. THERE IS ALSO A PONY CLUB WHICH IS ON DIFFERENT NIGHTS OF THE WEEK.QUITE A FEW OF THE CHILDREN IN OUR COMMUNITY ATTEND THIS CLUB.MOST OF THOSE OWN A HORSE OR PONY THEMSELVES. ON WEDNESDAYS THERE IS FOOTBALL PRACTICE WITH MR.DUFFY OUR LOCAL TEAMS MANAGER(BRORA RANGERS,WHO PLAY IN THE HIGHLAND LEAGUE)THIS IS AT THE FASKALLY RECREATION FOOTBALL PITCH THIS IS FROM 6:45PM TO APPROXIMATELY 8:00PM. ON THURSDAY IS THE YOUTH CLUB.A LOT OF PEOPLE IN OUR SCHOOL GO TO THIS
